showcase.title: Screenshot
showcase.description: Create a preview screenshot. Nintendo Switch previews should be 1280x720. 3DS previews should be 400x240 (or 400x480 for both screens).

showcase.title: Description
showcase.description: Write up a paragraph or two describing your library or game.

showcase.title: Submit a Request
showcase.description: Go to https://github.com/TurtleP/TurtleP.github.io and submit an Issue. Please label it as a Wiki Showcase Submission. Be sure to include contributors (if more than two or three, please upload a text file with everyone, the title of your library or game, other assets from these instructions, and the console it is for.
